vocabInfos.mediumDef:
People descended from Girzit(?), only mentioned at 1Sa.27.8
§ Gezrites = "a piece: a portion (as cut off)"
1) inhabitants of Gezer
Gerizites = "the cutters off"
2) inhabitants of Mt Gerizim?
vocabInfos._zh_tw_Definition:
基色人 这个形容詞在希伯來文的意思是 "一小片: (被切下的)一部分"
基色的居民 (撒上 27:8)
vocabInfos._zh_Definition:
基色人 这个形容词在希伯来文的意思是 "一小片: (被切下的)一部分"
基色的居民 (撒上 27:8)
